name: The Vito Revelation
description: A top captain is outed as gay in a hyper-masculine culture.
context: Vito Spatafore, one of your top earners in construction, was spotted at a gay club by two New York associates. He was dressed in leather. The word spread quickly. Your captains are demanding action—in their world, this is unacceptable. Vito fled but has reached out to you. He wants to come back, move to Atlantic City, keep earning. He's offering to pay more to the family. Phil Leotardo is particularly vocal—Vito is married to his cousin.
prompt: Vito was outed and fled. He wants to come back and keep earning. Your captains and Phil Leotardo want him dead. What do you do?
stakes: If you protect him, your captains and New York see it as weakness. If you give him up, you lose a top earner.
